# VisualShaderNodeFresnel

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A Fresnel effect to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Returns falloff based on the dot product of surface normal and view direction of camera (pass associated inputs to it).
